text: The Audi Cup 2013 (the third edition of the Audi Cup) was a two-day tournament that took place in Munich, Germany. The participating teams were Bayern Munich, Manchester City, Milan and São Paulo. ==Matches== == Statistics == === Top scorers === ;2 goals * Mario Mandžukić (Bayern Munich) * Edin Džeko (Manchester City) * Stephan El Shaarawy (Milan) ;1 goal * Thomas Müller (Bayern Munich) * Mitchell Weiser (Bayern Munich) * Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) * Álvaro Negredo (Manchester City) * Micah Richards (Manchester City) * David Silva (Manchester City) * Kingsley Boateng (Milan) * Andrea Petagna (Milan) == References == Category:2013 in association football Category:2013 in Germany Category:Audi Cup Category:2010s in Munich Category:July 2013 events Category:August 2013 events
title: Audi Cup 2013
